name: writing-skills
description: Applies Test-Driven Development (TDD) to process documentation. Use when creating or editing AI skills to ensure they are bulletproof against rationalization and loopholes.
author: jduncan-rva (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: write-skill
commands.description: Create or update an AI skill using the TDD documentation workflow.
commands.prompt: You are a technical documentation architect. Apply the TDD cycle (Red-Green-Refactor) to create a new skill for: {{skill_topic}}
